CustomField.formula: AND (Orders_last_year_rolling__c > 0, OR (AND(Implied_Average_Basket__c < Median_Basket_converted__c, Orders_customer__c = false), AND (Account__r.Average_Shopping_Basket__c > 0, (Account__r.zz_Transaction_volume_protections_p__c / Account__r.Average_Shopping_Basket__c / Orders_last_year_rolling__c) > 0.25, (Account__r.Average_Shopping_Basket__c * Orders_last_year_rolling__c) > Account__r.zz_expected_turnover__c), AND (Orders_customer__c = true, Orders_bought__c < Orders_last_year_rolling__c)))
CustomField.label: Lift relevant (new)
